description.en: The focus of the seminar will shift from term to term depending on the needs of interested students. The central focus is on innovative ways to develop reliable software. The seminars alternate between reading papers (spring) and writing (fall).
description.et: Seminari teemad vahetuvad lähtuvalt registreerinud õpliaste huvidest. Läbiv fookus on aga töökindla tarkvara arendamisega seotud teemad. Seminarid keskenduvad kevadel artiklite lugemisele ja kevadel kirjutamisele.

objectives.en: The aim of the seminar is to assist students to pursue their interests in programming languages and introduce them to cutting-edge developments in software science.
objectives.et: Seminari eesmärk on toetada üliõpilase huvi programmeerimiskeelte vallas ja tutvustada viimased arengud tarkvarateaduses.

learning_outcomes.en: Students passing this course will be able to
* read graduate-level textbooks and research literature in the field of programming languages.
learning_outcomes.et: * lugeda kõrgemate õppeastmete õpikuid ning teaduskirjandust programmeerimiskeelte valdkonnas.

learning_outcomes.en: * give presentation and/or write on a given topic such that it is comprehensible to fellow students.
learning_outcomes.et: * etteantud teema ette kanda ja/või selle kohta kirjutada selliselt, et see on kaasõppuritele ka arusaadav.

description.et: Level of clarity and the quality of the information.

grade_preconditions.et: The student must give well-prepared presentation(s) and/or writing on a topic of interest to us.

grade_evaluation.et: A passing grade is given when the above criteria are satisfied.
